hero_text: I create high-quality, functional, aesthetically pleasing websites using the latest technologies and relevant standards.
hero_quoteText: I don't forget my mistakes, I use them to my advantage.
aboutMe_label: Hello! My name is Artem Lira; I graduated from STEP IT Academy as a front-end developer and continue to develop in this field. During my year of study, I gained a lot of helpful knowledge and skills in web application development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.
aboutMe_text1: After graduating from the academy, I worked on several projects that helped me to consolidate my knowledge and skills. For example, I used React to create dynamic components and ensure that information was displayed quickly and efficiently on the page.
aboutMe_text2: I am always interested in learning new technologies and development practices. Recently, I have been exploring the possibilities of using TypeScript and Next.js to improve the efficiency of web application development.
aboutMe_text3: In my portfolio, you can find a detailed description of my projects and the skills I have. If you are interested in cooperation, please contact me using the contact details listed on my portfolio. Thank you for your attention, and I look forward to the opportunity to cooperate!
about_label: Hello, my name is Artem Lira!
about_aboutMe: I'm a front-end developer from Zaporizhzhya, Ukraine. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and turn them into modern, user-friendly web resources.
about_text: Transforming my creativity and knowledge into websites has been my passion since 2021. I help a variety of clients establish their online presence. Therefore, I am always keen to learn the latest technologies and frameworks.
contacts_text: I am looking for development opportunities in an IT company or freelance projects. I am ready to work on new challenges and projects. Are you interested in cooperation? Contact me
